about_the_game:
This game is a sequel of "My Kirin kidney and my beloved teachers". It's an interactive visual novel set against the backdrop of a fictional ancient fantasy world. The narrative centers around Lin Hao, a celestial domain warrior endowed with enigmatic powers. This immersive experience transports readers into a vibrant tapestry woven from mythical creatures, majestic landscapes, and intricate human relationships.

In this visual interactive novel, players assume the role of Lin Hao, navigating through a series of dramatic plot twists: from his first encounter with Xia Yatong—a brilliant and beautiful businesswoman—to confronting internal family conflicts; from battling malevolent forces to safeguard what he cherishes most, ultimately unraveling the hidden secrets that lie beneath. Every decision made by the player shapes the story's trajectory, leading to multiple endings ranging from heartwarming reunions to bittersweet farewells. The game introduces numerous characters, each with distinct storylines and personal development arcs, enriching the overall narrative tapestry.

content_descriptors.notes: Mature content with normal sexual behavior appears in the game
